title: 'Come on Pep!' - Dyche's response to Guardiola's weight demands
subtitle: Nottingham Forest manager Sean Dyche has told his players to "enjoy themselves" but to "use common sense" over christmas. His comments follow Pep Guardiola's admission that Manchester City's players will be weighed when they return to training to check their fitness has not dropped over the festive period.
full_text: Nottingham Forest manager Sean Dyche has told his players to "enjoy themselves" but to "use common sense" over christmas. His comments follow Pep Guardiola's admission that Manchester City's players will be weighed when they return to training to check their fitness has not dropped over the festive period.
